_instructions: Fill in this template with your property details. For images, upload photos to Google Drive, right-click > Share > 'Anyone with the link', then paste the sharing link below. We'll convert it automatically. Save this file as your-property-name.json and send it back to us.

property.name: Your Property Name
property.tagline: Short tagline e.g. Lakefront Retreat, Mountain Hideaway, Beachfront Bach
property.nearbyDistances: e.g. 10 minutes to town centre. 30 minutes to ski field. 1 hour to airport.

host.bio: Tell guests about yourself — who you are, your connection to the property, why you love it there. 2-3 sentences works well.

description: First paragraph: Describe what makes your property special — the views, the setting, the vibe. What will guests see when they arrive?
Second paragraph: Describe the interior — bedrooms, living spaces, kitchen, outdoor areas. What's the layout like?
Third paragraph (optional): Personal touch — why you love this place, what makes it unique, tips for guests.

images._instructions: Add as many photos as you like. Upload each to Google Drive, share publicly ('Anyone with the link'), and paste the sharing URL. Give each photo a label so guests know what they're looking at. The first image is your hero/main shot.

houseRules.rules: e.g. No smoking. No pets. Quiet hours after 10pm. Maximum 8 guests.

cancellation: e.g. Full refund if cancelled 14+ days before check-in. 50% refund if cancelled 7-14 days before. No refund within 7 days.
